message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm aiming to sell it for $18,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $18,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000.
I understand your budget concerns, Bob, but $10,000 is significantly less than what I'm willing to accept.  How about we meet in the middle at $14,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $14,000 is still a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000.
Bob, I'm trying to be fair, but I can't go as low as $11,000. This product is worth a lot to me.  Would you be willing to do $12,500?
I think we're getting close, but $12,500 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so how about $11,500?
Bob, this is a really good deal on a great product. I'm willing to come down slightly to $12,250, but I can't go any lower than that.
I'm really close to my budget, but I'm still a bit short. I'd be willing to pay $12,000 for the product, which is the maximum I'm willing to spend. Can you meet me at this price?
